about_the_game: The Legacy Advantage gives the player many skill bonuses, additional gold, and a very powerful artifact as a mysterious stranger from the past crosses the barriers of time and space to aid the lost heir in their quest to save Daria.  Although help will be given, a new danger emerges which threatens to destroy everything.
